events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of May 1st involving rear-end collision on the highway.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident following review of initial report and vehicle involved.
An insurance claims agent has been assigned to handle the case and reach out to the claimant shortly.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer confirming receipt and outlining next steps for processing.
Request for supporting documents including photos of the vehicle damage and police accident report was sent to the customer.
The claimant has submitted all requested documentation, including detailed images of the damaged vehicle and the official police report.
Investigation into the accident circumstances and liability begun based on collected evidence and third-party statements.
The investigation team has finalized their report confirming the insured was not at fault in the collision incident.
An initial settlement offer reflecting the repair costs and related expenses has been proposed to the claimant.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and the overall claims service received during the handling process.
Formal approval of the claim has been completed following positive feedback and acceptance of the settlement terms.
Payment for the approved settlement amount has been successfully issued to the claimantâ€™s designated account.
The claim has been officially closed after payment, with no outstanding issues or open items remaining.
All case files and documents related to the auto accident claim have been archived securely for future reference if needed.
